Commentary: Taken from bottom of SCI, already includes effect of currency conversions

Account_name: Effect of month-to-month exchange rate changes on Net Assets
Commentary: Change in XR multiplied by entire NA of last period (quick and dirty method)

Formula: (XR_{t1} - XR_{t0}) * (SFP_A_CCE_CAD_{t0} + SFP_A_AR_CAD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_FI_CAD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_E_CAD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_D_CAD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_O_CAD_{t0} - SFP_L_DTB_CAD_{t0} - SFP_L_AP_CAD_{t0} - SFP_L_FL_CAD_{t0})
Commentary: Change in XR multiplied by all A-L accounts denoted in this currency (more granular but convoluted)

Formula: (XR_{t1} - XR_{t0}) * (SFP_A_CCE_CNY_{t0} + SFP_A_AR_CNY_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_FI_CNY_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_E_CNY_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_D_CNY_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_O_CNY_{t0} - SFP_L_DTB_CNY_{t0} - SFP_L_AP_CNY_{t0} - SFP_L_FL_CNY_{t0})
Commentary: Change in XR multiplied by all A-L accounts denoted in this currency (more granular but convoluted)

Formula: (XR_{t1} - XR_{t0}) * (SFP_A_CCE_USD_{t0} + SFP_A_AR_USD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_FI_USD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_E_USD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_D_USD_{t0} + SFP_A_FA_O_USD_{t0} - SFP_L_DTB_USD_{t0} - SFP_L_AP_USD_{t0} - SFP_L_FL_USD_{t0})
Commentary: Change in XR multiplied by all A-L accounts denoted in this currency (more granular but convoluted)

账本名称: 报告期末属于拥有赎回权的所有者的净资产
Account_name: Net Assets attributable to redeemable participating shareholders at the end of period
